name: Lockdown (journaliciouz)
description:
Lockdown is a dialogue based deckbuilding game with a retro adventure game vibe. 

You control Becca who finds herself quarantined in the hallway with no way to get back into her apartment. She is mute and without her means to communicate with her strange neighbours gathered in the hallway to find out what's going on, but a mysterious entity offers her a voice.

Find the janitor. Get a spare key. And get back to safety. With dialogue cards!

During the Corona quarantine I created a few small game prototypes to experiment with story driven games. And this is one of them!

Music by Ambulo
→ https://open.spotify.com/artist/6sPQwc6lix6K1Gv64v91Ml

Environment by Mark Iversen.
